Rebecca Mardach About Services Blog Contact

Dr. Mardach is a pediatrician and board certified clinical and biochemical geneticist with interests in the application of genomics to the diagnosis of rare genetic diseases, neurogenetic and metabolic disorders, and cancer risk assessment. She provides clinical genetic assessments to pediatric and adult patients at the UC Davis Mind Institute Genomics Clinic. In collaboration with UC Davis Health neurologists, she has begun a neurogenetic service and plans to work with other departments integrating genomics into other medical specialties.

Services and Areas of Practice

Clinical and Biochemical Geneticist

Dr. Mardach is pioneering telehealth genomic education to advance genetic and genomic knowledge among international health providers. She is also participating in building the Genomics Telemedicine Program that will increase access to specialized care for individuals living in distant geographical areas.

Medical Professor

Dr. Mardach has taught for 20 years at the David Geffen School of Medicine at UCLA. She currently teaches at the UC Davis School of Medicine.

Clinical Investigator

As a metabolic specialist, Dr. Mardach has served extensively as an investigator participating in clinical trials for new therapeutic products.

Medical Consultant Specializing in Inborn Errors of Metabolism

For 24 years Dr. Mardach practiced as the only biochemical geneticist at Kaiser Permanente Southern California, providing expert advice to other physicians in the management and diagnosis of metabolic conditions.
